      public Line2D(Point p1, Point p2)
      Constructs a Line2D from two Points on the line
      Parameters:
      p1 - a Point on the Line2D
      p2 - another Point on the Line2D
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either p1 or p2 is not 2D

    • Line2D

      public Line2D(Point basePoint, Vector directionVector)
      Constructs a Line2D from a Point and a Vector
      Parameters:
      basePoint - a Point on the Line2D
      directionVector - a Vector describing the direction of the Line2D
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either basePoint or directionVector is not 2D
